messages.message:
Planning to write a doc around this in more detail.

For Now: 1000 page for PDF is very different from 1000 page from OCR.  1000 page for PDF will incur ~1GB of memory (from our most recent benchmarking), so if we have 4 of them running in parallel on a App Task, weâ€™ll be very close to 4G.  (This is without layout and word metadata info).  Need to do more benchmarking around that.
